name: sketchily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that contains few details: The rather sketchily defined piece of legislation could make the UK a less attractive location for international companies. Some topics were covered so sketchily that pupils were left with little idea of context or significance. See
sketchy
More examplesFewer examplesIt's an unconvincing piece of work with numerous sketchily described characters. His own difficulties with his wife are sketchily explained and resolved.Let me explain sketchily how this works.
